cards.title: Tiara
cards.text: Veil held in place by Queen Mary's diamond and platinum bandeau tiara, lent by The Queen.

cards.title: Hair and make-up
cards.text: The bride’s hair was styled by Serge Normant, with make-up by her friend and make-up artist Daniel Martin.

cards.title: Earrings
cards.text: Meghan’s earrings and bracelet are by Cartier.

cards.title: The veil
cards.text: Five-metres long, made from silk tulle, featuring hand-embroidered flowers from each of the 53 Commonwealth countries.

cards.title: The dress
cards.text: By British designer, Clare Waight Keller. Features an open bateau neckline, three-quarter sleeves and underskirt in triple silk organza.

cards.title: The fabric
cards.text: A double-bonded silk cady with soft matt lustre. The pure white was chosen by Meghan and the designer to bring a "fresh modernity".

cards.title: The flowers
cards.text: Bouquet included flowers handpicked by Harry at Kensington Palace, as well as the Princess of Wales’ favourite flower forget-me-nots.
